attributes.action: Stop the bright LED lights being used in cars which dazzle other drivers
attributes.additional_details: Numerous people are blinded momentarily with the increasing using of bright white lights when passing on the road due to the level of brightness which needs to be regulated as it’s becoming an issue with newer cars.
attributes.background: Have a limit of how bright the car headlights are as it’s becoming a problem to differentiate between normal headlights and fog lights in normal weather.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban LED vehicle headlights or regulate bulb wattage
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744882
